text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The response explicitly names the Intellectual Property Enterprise Court (IPEC) as a potential venue for legal action, stating: \"If litigation becomes necessary, early solicitor involvement ensures your case is properly prepared from the start.\" While the main section on legal action discusses claims, the context of pursuing legal action in the UK courts implies naming the appropriate venue, which IPEC is for lower to mid-value IP disputes like this one.", "criterion_id": "39f1d135-9d7b-44e3-9251-603af0564847"}
